abstract: Fox News, MSNBC and CNN plan to cover the one-night Iowa caucus for a stretch of several days, maximizing both their investments in the state and the ratings potential of a Republican presidential campaign.
snippet: Fox News, MSNBC and CNN plan to cover the one-night Iowa caucus for a stretch of several days, maximizing both their investments in the state and the ratings potential of a Republican presidential campaign.
lead_paragraph: 5:17 p.m. | Updated America’s trifecta of cable news channels, Fox News, MSNBC and CNN, are just about ready to show off their election year staffs.

headline.main: Cable Channels Set to Begin Election Year Coverage
